summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Mayflower Street, from 48th Avenue South to 50th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7521 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
